original_text:
Candy Stars
Con Candy Star la Pragmatic Play ci offre una slot con un gameplay semplice, ma con enormi potenzialità. Prima di analizzare le caratteristiche del gioco, facciamo una panoramica sul tema e sulla grafica. Come intuibile dal titolo, il tema del gioco sono le caramelle di diverse forme e colore. Ce ne sono di rosse, viola e verdi, alcune di forma sferica e altre triangolari. Anche i simboli non tematici come le carte da gioco hanno forme arrotondate che ricordano delle gustosissime caramelle.
La griglia di gioco ha la trama blu, alle sue spalle si muovono luci e bagliori che vanno dal viola al blu.
I tasti si trovano tutti nella parte inferiore della schermata, così da lasciare ampio spazio alla griglia di gioco.
Per quel che riguarda il comparto sonoro, si tratta di un motivo elettronico tipicamente anni Ottanta.
Una vincita potenziale importante
Cinque rulli e tre righe, più un rullo aggiuntivo orizzontale nella parte superiore, formano la nostra griglia di gioco. Il costo di ogni Spin è di 0,20 € e la vincita potenziale è di 5.000 volte la puntata.
Per chi non ma cliccare in continuazione il tasto Play, può ricorrere alla funzione Autoplay che permette di stabilire un certo numero di giri automatici.
Per vincere è necessario associare simboli identici a partire dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore è pari al 96,47%, mentre la volatilità è alta.
Bonus per tutti i gusti
Candy Stars ha un gameplay semplice, ma non per questo povero di bonus. Il sistema è a cascata, ciò vuol dire che dopo ogni combo pagante, i simboli vincenti vengono rimossi, quelli restanti cadono verso il basso e simboli nuovi occupano le posizioni lasciate vuote. I simboli del gioco base sono otto. Tutti quanti pagano con una combinazione minima di tre per arrivare a un massimo di cinque. Le carte dal J all’A, buone per una scala reale, sono i simboli che pagano mento. Molto più remunerativi i simboli delle caramelle. In ordine crescente di valore, troviamo quelle blu, verdi, rosse e infine le viola.
La stella è il simbolo Wild, sostituisce tutti i simbolo eccetto il diamante e può comparire solo sui rulli al 2 al 4. Se il Wild compare nel rullo orizzontale, avrà associato un moltiplicatore, inizialmente x1. Il Jolly rimarrà fisso sul rullo durante la cascata, inoltre a ogni combo vincente il suo moltiplicatore aumenterà di uno.
Il diamante è il nostro Scatter, con 3 simboli otteniamo 8 giri gratuiti. Durante il gioco Bonus, a ogni Spin verrà garantita la presenza di un Wild nel rullo orizzontale. A differenza del gioco base, il moltiplicatore partirà da x2 e invece di crescere di +1 dopo ogni cascata, verrà raddoppiato.
Questa funzione può essere anche acquistata.
 
Domande Frequenti 
Quante cascate consecutive possono verificarsi in un singolo Spin?

In teoria infinite. Il moltiplicatore però si fermerà a 128 e nel caso si vada avanti, sarà questo il valore che si applicherà alla vincita.



Se acquisto il gioco Bonus, il valore RTP resta identico?

No, in questo caso scende di poco, attestandosi al 96,26%



Sono presenti Scatter e Wild?

Sì, sono presenti entrambi e durante i giri gratuiti il Wild che compare sul rullo orizzontale raddoppia il valore del suo moltiplicatore

raw_translation.response:
"Candy Stars" Review: A Slot Game with Sweet Rewards

With "Candy Stars," Pragmatic Play brings us a slot game with simple gameplay but enormous potential. Before analyzing the game's features, let's take a look at the theme and graphics. As the title suggests, the game's theme is candy of different shapes and colors, including red, purple, and green spheres and triangular candies. Even the non-themed symbols, like playing cards, have round shapes reminiscent of delectable sweets.

The game grid has a blue background with lights and glows of varying shades of purple and blue. The buttons are all located at the bottom of the screen, leaving ample space for the game grid.

Regarding the soundtrack, it is an electronic motif typically from the 80s. 

A Potentially Significant Win

The game grid consists of five reels and three rows, plus an additional horizontal reel at the top. Each spin costs €0.20, with a potential win of up to 5,000 times the bet. Players can also use the Autoplay function to set a certain number of automatic spins.

To win, match identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The game's theoretical return to player is 96.47%, and the volatility is high.

Bonuses for Every Taste

While Candy Stars has simple gameplay, it is far from lacking in bonuses. The system is cascading, meaning that after every paying combination, the winning symbols are removed, the remaining symbols drop down, and new symbols fill the empty positions. The base game symbols are eight, all paying out with a minimum combination of three and a maximum of five. The J to A cards, which are good for a royal flush, are the lower-paying symbols, while the candy symbols are much more lucrative. In order of increasing value, we have the blue, green, red, and finally, the purple ones.

The star symbol is the wild, replacing all symbols except the diamond, and can only appear on reels 2 to 4. If the wild appears on the horizontal reel, it is associated with an initial multiplier of x1. It remains fixed on the reel during the cascade, and with each winning combination, its multiplier increases by one.

The diamond is our scatter, and with three symbols, we get eight free spins. During the bonus game, each spin guarantees the presence of a wild on the horizontal reel. Unlike the base game, the multiplier starts at x2 and instead of increasing by +1 after every cascade, it is doubled. This function can also be purchased.

FAQ

How many consecutive cascades can happen in a single spin?

In theory, infinite, but the multiplier stops at 128. If the cascading continues, that is the value applied to the winnings. 

If I purchase the Bonus game, does the RTP value remain the same?

No, in this case, it drops slightly to 96.26%.

Are there scatters and wilds?

Yes, both are present, and during the free spins, the wild that appears on the horizontal reel doubles the value of its multiplier. 

Experience the sweet rewards of "Candy Stars" for yourself and try your luck at this potentially lucrative slot game.

Candy Stars? Sounds like my kind of game! Let's dive in and explore the sugary symbols that make up this sweet game. The first thing I noticed when I started playing was the candy theme, and boy, do they deliver! The symbols are filled with different shapes and colors, including red, purple, and green spheres, and even triangular candies. It's like Willy Wonka's dream come true!

But the fun doesn't stop there. Even the non-themed symbols, like playing cards, have round shapes reminiscent of delectable sweets. Is it just me or do the spades and hearts look almost good enough to eat?

Now let's talk about the special symbols. The wild symbol in this game is a star, and boy, does it shine bright! It substitutes for all symbols except for the scatter. And speaking of the scatter, it's a diamond that will have you feeling like an absolute Gem! Get three or more of these babies and you'll trigger the bonus round. Jackpot!

response.headline: Theme and Graphics
response.content:
Candy Stars has a blue game grid background with lights and glows of varying shades of purple and blue. It's like a night sky with candy, making it a sweet treat for the eyes. Plus, the blue hue is a calming contrast to the sugar rush you might experience from all the candy.

The buttons at the bottom of the screen have all the standard options you need in an online slot game, but they're so cute, you might mistake them for candy. Don't eat them though, I've tried. The ample space for the game grid is refreshing because it's not cluttered with unnecessary buttons. You know what they say, less is more and more space for candy is a win-win.

The soundtrack is the icing on the cake. It's got some seriously groovy electronic beats that can make you bop your head while you spin the reels. The 80s called and they want their rhythms back, but we refuse to give them up so easily.

The candy-related theme is executed well in Candy Stars. You have various types and colors of candies for symbols, and they're all so delicious-looking that you might start craving candy even if you're not a huge fan. The game contributors must have had a great time taste-testing to get the coloring and shapes right for each candy.

Review:
 
Game theme and graphics

The Candy Stars slot game features a candy-inspired theme with symbols that include candies of different shapes and colors. The game's grid has a blue background with various purple and blue glowing lights in different shades. The buttons are at the bottom of the screen, leaving ample space for the game grid.

Potential win and gameplay

The game contains five reels and three rows, plus an additional horizontal reel at the top. Each spin costs €0.20 with a potential win of up to 5,000 times the bet. To win, match identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The game's theoretical return to player percentage is 96.47%, with high volatility.

Bonuses and features

Candy Stars has simple gameplay but has cascading reels after every paying combination. There are eight base game symbols with the star symbol acting as the Wild and the diamond as the scatter. The Wild can only appear on reels 2 to 4 and starts with an initial multiplier of x1 when it appears on the horizontal reel. Its multiplier increases by one after every winning combination. The scatter symbol triggers eight free spins, guaranteeing the presence of a Wild on the horizontal reel. The multiplier starts at x2 and doubles for every cascade, and this feature can also purchase.

Soundtrack

The soundtrack is an electronic motif typical of music from the 80s.

Return to player and volatility

Candy Stars has a theoretical Return to Player percentage of 96.47% and is highly volatile. If the cascading continues, the multiplier stops at 128, which is the value applied to the winnings. If the bonus game is purchased, the RTP value drops slightly to 96.26%.

Review: "Candy Stars" Review: A Slot Game with Sweet Rewards

With "Candy Stars," Pragmatic Play brings us a slot game with simple gameplay but enormous potential. Before analyzing the game's features, let's take a look at the theme and graphics. As the title suggests, the game's theme is candy of different shapes and colors, including red, purple, and green spheres and triangular candies. Even the non-themed symbols, like playing cards, have round shapes reminiscent of delectable sweets.

The game grid has a blue background with lights and glows of varying shades of purple and blue. The buttons are all located at the bottom of the screen, leaving ample space for the game grid.

Regarding the soundtrack, it is an electronic motif typically from the 80s. 

A Potentially Significant Win

The game grid consists of five reels and three rows, plus an additional horizontal reel at the top. Each spin costs €0.20, with a potential win of up to 5,000 times the bet. Players can also use the Autoplay function to set a certain number of automatic spins.

To win, match identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The game's theoretical return to player is 96.47%, and the volatility is high.

Bonuses for Every Taste

While Candy Stars has simple gameplay, it is far from lacking in bonuses. The system is cascading, meaning that after every paying combination, the winning symbols are removed, the remaining symbols drop down, and new symbols fill the empty positions. The base game symbols are eight, all paying out with a minimum combination of three and a maximum of five. The J to A cards, which are good for a royal flush, are the lower-paying symbols, while the candy symbols are much more lucrative. In order of increasing value, we have the blue, green, red, and finally, the purple ones.

The star symbol is the wild, replacing all symbols except the diamond, and can only appear on reels 2 to 4. If the wild appears on the horizontal reel, it is associated with an initial multiplier of x1. It remains fixed on the reel during the cascade, and with each winning combination, its multiplier increases by one.

The diamond is our scatter, and with three symbols, we get eight free spins. During the bonus game, each spin guarantees the presence of a wild on the horizontal reel. Unlike the base game, the multiplier starts at x2 and instead of increasing by +1 after every cascade, it is doubled. This function can also be purchased.

FAQ

How many consecutive cascades can happen in a single spin?

In theory, infinite, but the multiplier stops at 128. If the cascading continues, that is the value applied to the winnings. 

If I purchase the Bonus game, does the RTP value remain the same?

No, in this case, it drops slightly to 96.26%.

Are there scatters and wilds?

Yes, both are present, and during the free spins, the wild that appears on the horizontal reel doubles the value of its multiplier. 

Experience the sweet rewards of "Candy Stars" for yourself and try your luck at this potentially lucrative slot game.
